description: Date change for Hearts v Killie
title: Date change for Hearts v Killie
title_page: Date change for Hearts v Killie - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Premiership game between Hearts and Kilmarnock next weekend has been pushed back 24 hours because of the Tynecastle side's European involvement.
Killie's visit to Gorgie will now take place at 15:00 BST on Sunday, 13 August.
Hearts are away to Norwegians Rosenborg in the first leg of their Europa Conference League third-round qualifier on Thursday, 10 August.
